title: Battle for Freljord Event Trigger [Gameplay]
body:
I was playing an ARAM as Ashe against enemy Sejuani. The Battle for Freljord Event came up, and I somehow won the event off of my first kill after the trigger, by killing the enemy Shaco. I didn't touch the Sejuani after the event triggered, and she never died, so it wasn't off of an assist.

(Brief video of it happening)

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=7vvzrLs5r98

replies.body:
Hey NearaMalfore! 

Thanks for the report! We'll take a listen and see what's going on here.
